verbs.description: In [V: choosing] [ARG1: Singapore] [ARGM-PRP: for their historic summit] , President Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un agreed on a neutral nation known as a bastion of law and order where even littering can draw a heavy fine . Trump announced the meeting will be held June 12 .
